Package com.kamikazejam.kamicommon.nms.abstraction.block

Class AbstractBlockUtil

java.lang.Object
com.kamikazejam.kamicommon.nms.abstraction.block.AbstractBlockUtil
public abstract class AbstractBlockUtil extends Object
Methods every BlockUtil implementation has to implement. Subclasses may add additional version-dependent utility methods.
